00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_K_VECTOR_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_K_VECTOR_H_
00029 
00030 // Include STL less comparison template (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00033 namespace kche_tree {
00034 
00043 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T> >
00044 class KVector {
00045 public:
00047   KVector(unsigned int K, const Compare &c = Compare());
00048 
00050   ~KVector();
00051 
00052   // K-vector properties.
00053   bool empty() const; 
00054   bool full() const; 
00055   unsigned int size() const; 
00056 
00057   const T &front() const; 
00058   const T &back() const; 
00059 
00060   // Operations.
00061   void pop_back(); 
00062   void push_back(const T &elem); 
00063 
00064 protected:
00065   T *data; 
00066   unsigned int K; 
00067   unsigned int stored; 
00068   const Compare &compare; 
00069 
00070   void push_not_full(const T &elem); 
00071   void push_full(const T &elem); 
00072 };
00073 
00074 } // namespace kche_tree
00075 
00076 // Template implementation.
00077 #include "k-vector.tpp"
